::Zardus::

Zardus nods and taps his wrist comp, tapping in a few commands. He had to send them three times before they get through the ship's walls and get to the Iron Fist.

"Allright, a shuttle will be here soon. Lets get these femms outside."

He bends down and picks up Aelo, lifting her to his shoulder and walking off toward the exit. He motions Mosquitor to follow, the bug obeying.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Back at the Iron Fist, a shuttle flies out and heads toward Zardus's location.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> Ocipite:
> 
> The femme tried to open her eyes, and she moved weakly. Pain was high 
> and she was confused.
> 
>

> > ::he points to Aelo::

> destroying her on 
> > the inside.
> > ::He finally points to Ocipite::
> > Wheeljack: She's half awake, i think she's too weak to fight.
